subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Denis Menchov, a Russian on the Rabobank team, retained the leader’s pink jersey on the final climbing day of this arduous, three-week race that ends Sunday.
snippet: Denis Menchov, a Russian on the Rabobank team, retained the leader’s pink jersey on the final climbing day of this arduous, three-week race that ends Sunday.
